profile:
We Design, Construct and Maintain outdoor spaces that leave you breathless.

We are Ontario's leading landscaping and construction company, based in Toronto. We pride ourselves in providing professional, accurate and friendly service. We always assure 100% satisfaction to every customer, with quality work that lasts - for years and years of enjoyment.

We will help you with individual design ideas, materials, location recommendations & anything else needed, to get your landscaping project started.

All work is performed in an ethical and patient - yet timely - manner. And the quality is proudly guaranteed for up to 5 years.

profile:
Welcome to Easy Pools

Does looking out at your underwhelming backyard fill you with ideas of the extraordinary space it could be?
A beautiful setting to entertain friends, a private oasis for relaxation and rejuvenation, a place the kids never tire of! You want to make the most of your property – and your free time – but when it comes to pool designs and pool landscaping, maybe you’re not sure where to begin. We encourage you to make the most of your time by taking an hour of ours. Start with just an hour talking with us to get an idea of the real possibilities for your space. Customizing your whole pool experience is something we’re passionate about!

About Us:

IT’S A MATTER OF TIME.
We’re all so short on time today. We need to make the most of the downtime we have with unforgettably great experiences.
At Easy Pools we understand that, and we know that having a beautiful backyard space with a fabulous pool is one of the best ways to create those great times – right outside your own door.
We’ve found that we can help you achieve that ideal space by giving fully of our time, from planning to completion, to ensure you end up with a pool setting that will add real value to your home, and your home life.

That means you can feel free to ask as many questions as you want, whenever you want – we’ll have all the time you need. It also means that during the construction phase we take our time to deliver superb workmanship. No cutting corners. No details left undone. Ensuring your needs are met by spending our own time wisely is how we work. It’s what makes us different.

For over ten years, Easy Pools  has been creating beautiful properties for homeowners in the GTA, including landscapes, stonework, patios, outdoor structures and pools. 

Over the years, we’ve perfected our project management skills so that your projects are not only finished on time and on budget, but client courtesy is core. There is always a dedicated manager to stay in touch with you, promptly answering calls or meeting to discuss the project. Staff always operate in a safe, conscientious and friendly manner.

We appreciate you taking the time to find out about us and we hope you find what you need. If you’d like to discuss the possibility of adding a pool to your home, we would love to hear from you.

Our Services Include:
*Swimming Pool Features: vanishing edges, expanding underwater steps, baja steps for lounging, customzied chapes, naturalized surroundings, integrated waterfalls and waterspouts, integrated or freestanding spa pools
*Beautfiul Utility Features: In-pool and surrounding lighting, safety fencing, utility sheds / cabana / shower or bar area, slope-adjusting retaining walls
*Landscaping
*Lighting

profile:
Bancheri Bros Interlocking & Paving Ltd. is an landscape design company specializing in interlocking paver installation, pool installation and asphalt paving.  

With over 20 years of experience in interlocking and paving installations, we will help you create a distinctive design element that will enhance your homes appeal, increase its value and offer a unique look that only Bancheri Bros. can offer. Bancheri Bros. is a family owned and operated business. We take pride in all our work and offer written guarantees as well as a lifetime guaranty on the structural integrity offered by the manufacturer. All of our employees are experienced and well trained in installing and working together to provide a superior amount of quality, workmanship and costumer satisfaction.

Bancheri Bros. Interlocking and Paving Corp. has installed countless driveways, walkways, retaining walls, steps and patios of all shapes and sizes. Each job is customized and designed to suit each and every single site, we offer free on-site consultations and estimates for every job.

Why Choose Bancheri Bros. as your interlocking installer?

Bancheri Bros. Interlocking and Paving Corp is a family owned and operated busines, this means that at all times there is an owner supervising the site. This helps ensure sure the quality and workmanship of all our projects are beyond the customers expectations.

For over 20 years Bancheri Bros. has always been about customers first. We have all of the latest tools and equipment to accommodate any size job, we can offer products from any of the top industry suppliers and we start and finish each job on time and efficiently.
products: Interlocking concrete pavers are a smart and elegant design choice. They are manufactured to withstand weight and weather. They are laid in bedding sand just as flagstone, cobblestone, and brick, but they interlock to provide a perfect, stable fit. They come in a wide variety of colors, shapes, textures, and designs. Interlocking pavers are easy to maintain and they provide an excellent drainage system for your driveway.
services: Interlocking, Swimming Pools nd Outdoor Living Space.
brands: Will work with all brands if requested
specialities: We specialize in outdoor spaces of all sizes. Driveways, walkways, Patios, Front entrances, swimming pools

profile: At AquaSpa Pools we believe that a pool and its surrounding landscape is more than just a home improvement. It is an exciting new lifestyle. Quality pool and landsacping design increases the value and beauty of your property, brings tranquility and enjoyment to your backyard and is an expression of who you are. As every person and family is different, so is every project. Your backyard retreat will be customized to suit your individual needs and bring your dream surroundings to life. From inviting pools and spas, to flagstone paths and rejuvenating gardens, we treat every project as if it were our own home. DESIGN Our certified pool and landscape designers will listen to your ideas and wishes, and offer their experienced input. Then they will visualize your dream space, using the latest CAD design programs and hand-drawn renderings. QUALITY AquaSpa Pools & Landscape Design uses only the best construction materials, combined with experienced quality workmanship. Our knowledge of proper construction techniques will give you years of trouble-free enjoyment. TIMELINES We constantly amaze our clients with the speed in which we complete our projects. We go to great lengths to ensure that projects stay on schedule and that the final results surpass all expectations. WARRANTY We partner with the best equipment suppliers in the industry to provide our clients with premium products and comprehensive manufacturer warranties. AquaSpa Pools & Landscape Design stands by all of the work that we do, making the enjoyment of your new backyard retreat worry-free. SERVICE At AquaSpa we not only design and build your pool and landscaping, we also provide reliable after-service. Our familiarity with your unique project and our trained staff's knowledge of the equipment used will ensure efficient service and maintenance. After-services include pool opening and closing, safety cover installations, liner replacement and more. ENVIRONMENTAL RESPONSIBILITY Our pools use intelligent multispeed pumps and 2" plumbing to reduce electrical consumption, increase efficiency and pass savings along to you,. Cartridge style filters are used to avoid wasting water during backwashes, not to mention conforming to City by-law reference sewer use. Using safe water systems eliminates the need for harsh chemicals and the pollution associated with the production, packaging and transportation of these dangerous materials. Option R value insulation is used behind the steel panels and in the plumbing trenches to reduce the loss of heat. SPECIALIZING IN Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs, Water Features, Infinity Edge, Landscaping, Patios, Cabanas, Gazebos, Outdoor Kitchens & Fireplaces OUR PROFESSIONAL SERVICES INCLUDE: Renovations/Upgrades, Salt Water Conversions, Liner Replacement/Repair, Opening/Closings, General Repairs, Inspections, Safety Cover Installation ACCESSORIES Automatic Pool Cleaners, Pool Covers, Automatic Pool Covers, Fitness Swim Jets, Outdoor Lighting, Pool Controls, Water Accents, Salt Systems, Solar Systems

profile:
Our team have been operating since 2012 offering services in excavation and architectural concrete. With 30 year’s combined experience in the construction field carrying out a spectrum of works from site prep and specialized grading, sewer/water emergency repairs and decorative concrete work. Over the years the direction of the company has changed slightly, focusing for the past 5 years on the installation of fiberglass pools and their landscapes.
Making mention to our past allows us to comfort our clients in knowing our team is multifaceted and do not leave any stone un turned. Our prior experience based on the same principles and similar processes by which fiberglass pools are installed gives us an edge. We are able to lead our clients to choosing the pool and equipment that is right for them, design spaces that fit their needs and very importantly to us, are installed the best way possible.
Our pool building experience has placed our team installing fiberglass pools across the Greater Toronto area including; Mississauga, Brampton, Etobicoke, Vaughan and York region.
Operating on a single mantra “Make it Happen” our team works through heat, rain and long hours to bring your project to life. This mantra is one we do not just quote but truly live our lives. What separates a business is the above and beyond aspect offered to the client, making it happen is greater than a single task, it is a commitment that promises made are kept and that no matter the challenge there is always a solution to make it succeed. The quality, efficiency and reliability of our work speaks for itself.
Coupled with this, our relationship with premier suppliers like Narellan pools speaks volumes to the promise we make our clients. In short, we provide the best product with the very best installation. An asset to your property that will be around for years and hour after hour it is used, unforgettable moments of fun with family and friends.
The team supports the local community through various school programs and are huge hockey fans and proud supporters of Toronto Maple Leafs, Toronto Raptors and Toronto FC.

profile: We are a premier installer of both custom vinyl and fiberglass swimming pools in the GTA, York, Halton and Peel regions. Yorkstone Pools & Landscapes is a division of Patterned Concrete Mississauga (www.pcmiss.ca), which has been providing customers with unique architectural concrete finishes since 1990. The principal owners of Patterned Concrete have an extensive pool construction background and over the years have been growing the business to become one of the largest Patterned Concrete producers worldwide.

profile: Have you ever had daydreams about ending your hectic day by coming home to a relaxing and soothing environment? At Backyard Retreat Home and Leisure, our goal is for you to look no further than your own backyard for the perfect getaway. We offer the highest quality products and services on the market today. We are proud suppliers of Canada’s leading brands of hot tubs, swim spas, pools, patio furniture, BBQ’s and outdoor living products. Stop into one of our showrooms  today where our expert team will gladly get you into the backyard of your dreams at an affordable price. We are your One-Stop-Shop to make your dreams a reality and our customer’s satisfaction is our number one goal!
